hanzi-su-wiki:
憶

Значения

Думать, размышлять, вспоминать

Мнемоника

Навязчивые думы, конфликт желаний 意 и сердца 忄.

Варианты

忆
purpleculture_pinyin:
yì
to recollect; to remember; memory
вспомнить; помнить; объем памяти

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 忆)
Pictophonetic: 意 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 忄 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
    • 意 [ yì ] thought, idea, opinion; desire, wish; meaning, intention
heisig_chinese_memo: Recalling is about bringing ideas back to your mind.
heisig_constituent: recollection, Freud, state of mind, idea, sound, vase, stand up, sun, day, heart
koohiiStory1: Recollection is about bringing ideas back to your mind.
koohiiStory2: Data´s recollection powers are unparalled. He never loses a single idea.
jp_example_words: 記憶(きおく): memory, recollection, remembrance
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When your soul has an idea it's just a recollection of something you already know. Only your brain can have original ideas, so when your soul tries to come up with one, it's just a recollection of something you thought before now.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: When you have a recollection of some idea or thing in the past, it's just your soul saying, hey remember this? Let's not forget this.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your soul is sending you a recollection right now of... your past life as a farmer in Oklahoma (おく). You see yourself farming and sweating and living a wonderful life. Hmm, maybe you should move to Oklahoma and live the simple life again.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine recollecting a past life in Oklahoma. Life was simple and nice. You should consider taking this as a sign to move there again!
Ru_Radicals: 忙 (занятой), 心 (сердце), 日 (день), 立 (стоять), 音 (звук)
Ru_trainchinese:
yì: (глаг) помнить; вспоминать
yì: (сущ) "Воспоминания" (Ба Цзинь)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the idea (意) remains in your heart (忄) as a memory
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Fishhooks but me in a state of mind where I recall my childhood fishing with my father.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " heart " to the " meaning " sound. The original meaning is to miss and miss. "Release name. "Shi Yanyu": "Remembering, meaning also, constant in mind." "Guang Yun. "Zhi Yun": "Remembering, reading also." Such as "Selected Works. Pan Anren's "Sorrow and Eternal Passage": "The past is the same and the present is in another world. Recalling the old is joyful and adding new sadness." "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Horizontally blowing tunes. "Mulan Poem": "Ask women what to think? Ask women what to remember? Women also have no thoughts, and women have no memories."

" Yi " means to remember, to remember. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "Wang Chong's Biography": "The family is poor and has no books. He often travels to Luoyang City, reading the books sold, and he can recite the words at first sight, so he can spread the words of hundreds of families." "Song Shu. "The Biography of Wang Yikang in Pengcheng": "Also clever and knowing people, you will remember when you hear it, you will always meet temporarily, and you will never forget it, and you will have a lot of people. Every mark is remembered to show cleverness, and the characters benefit from this."

" Recalling " means recollection and memory. For example, the fifth of Tao Yuanming's "Miscellaneous Poems" of the Eastern Jin Dynasty: "Remembering when I was young, I was happy when I was not happy." The second of Du Fu's "Remembering the Past" of the Tang Dynasty: "Recalling the prosperity of the old days, Xiaoyi still has thousands of families."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " heart " to the " meaning " sound. The original meaning is to miss and miss.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「意」聲。本義是思念、想念。《釋名．釋言語》：「憶，意也，恒在意中也。」《廣韻．職韻》：「憶，念也。」如《文選．潘安仁〈哀永逝文〉》：「昔同塗兮今異世，憶舊歡兮增新悲。」《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭．木蘭詩》：「問女何所思？問女何所憶？女亦無所思，女亦無所憶。」

　　「憶」表示記住、記憶。如《後漢書．王充傳》：「家貧無書，常游洛陽市肆，閱所賣書，一見輒能誦憶，遂博通眾流百家之言。」《宋書．彭城王義康傳》：「又聰識過人，一聞必記，常所暫遇，終生不忘，稠人廣席，每標所憶以示聰明，人物益以此推服之。」

　　「憶」表示回想、回憶。如東晉陶淵明〈雜詩〉其五：「憶我少壯時，無樂自欣豫。」唐代杜甫〈憶昔〉之二：「憶昔開元全盛日，小邑猶藏萬家室。」
humanum_short_description: 從「心」，「意」聲。本義是思念、想念。

記憶(きおく): memory, recollection, remembrance
從「 心 」，「 意 」聲。本義是思念、想念。《釋名．釋言語》：「憶，意也，恒在意中也。」《廣韻．職韻》：「憶，念也。」如《文選．潘安仁〈哀永逝文〉》：「昔同塗兮今異世，憶舊歡兮增新悲。」《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭．木蘭詩》：「問女何所思？問女何所憶？女亦無所思，女亦無所憶。」 「 憶 」表示記住、記憶。如《後漢書．王充傳》：「家貧無書，常游洛陽市肆，閱所賣書，一見輒能誦憶，遂博通眾流百家之言。」《宋書．彭城王義康傳》：「又聰識過人，一聞必記，常所暫遇，終生不忘，稠人廣席，每標所憶以示聰明，人物益以此推服之。」 「 憶 」表示回想、回憶。如東晉陶淵明〈雜詩〉其五：「憶我少壯時，無樂自欣豫。」唐代杜甫〈憶昔〉之二：「憶昔開元全盛日，小邑猶藏萬家室。」
From the " heart" to the " meaning" sound. The original meaning is to miss and miss. "Release name. "Shi Yanyu": "Remembering, meaning also, constant in mind." "Guang Yun. "Zhi Yun": "Remembering, reading also." Such as "Selected Works. Pan Anren's "Sorrow and Eternal Passage": "The past is the same and the present is in another world. Recalling the old is joyful and adding new sadness." "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Horizontally blowing tunes. "Mulan Poem": "Ask women what to think? Ask women what to remember? Women also have no thoughts, and women have no memories." " Yi" means to remember, to remember. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "Wang Chong's Biography": "The family is poor and has no books. He often travels to Luoyang City, reading the books sold, and he can recite the words at first sight, so he can spread the words of hundreds of families." "Song Shu. "The Biography of Wang Yikang in Pengcheng": "Also clever and knowing people, you will remember when you hear it, you will always meet temporarily, and you will never forget it, and you will have a lot of people. Every mark is remembered to show cleverness, and the characters benefit from this." " Recalling" means recollection and memory. For example, the fifth of Tao Yuanming's "Miscellaneous Poems" of the Eastern Jin Dynasty: "Remembering when I was young, I was happy when I was not happy." The second of Du Fu's "Remembering the Past" of the Tang Dynasty: "Recalling the prosperity of the old days, Xiaoyi still has thousands of families."

憶字的基本解释

憶
yì
见“忆”。

憶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》於力切，入職，影。］
“忆1”的繁体字。
(1)思念；想念。
(2)记住；不忘。
(3)回忆。
(4)臆度。
(5)用同“抑”。抑郁；抑制。参见“愊憶”、“憶逼”。

憶字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憶； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页404第33
【廣韻】於力切【集韻】【韻會】乙力切【正韻】伊昔切，?音抑。念也，思也，記也。【古詩】下有長相憶。　【增韻】古作意，誤。

憶字的源字形

Recall
Basic explanation of words
Recall
yì
See "Remembrance".
Recall
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guang Yun" Yu Liqie, entry, film. ]
Traditional characters of "忆1".
(1) Miss; miss.
(2) Remember; don't forget.
(3) Memories.
(4) Presumption.
(5) Use the same "inhibition". Depression; suppression. See "Yiyi", "Yibi".
Recall

[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　 Yi; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 404 33
[Guang Yun] Yu Liqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Yi Liqie [Zheng Yun] Ixiqie,? Sound suppression. Read, think, remember. [Ancient Poems] There are memories of long-term memories.　【Zengyun】Ancient intention, wrong.

Name meaning

yì
вм. 忆
Radicals: 忄, 意  (soul, idea)
Meaning Mnemonic
When your soul has an idea it's just a recollection of something you already know. Only your brain can have original ideas, so when your soul tries to come up with one, it's just a recollection of something you thought before now.
When you have a recollection of some idea or thing in the past, it's just your soul saying, hey remember this? Let's not forget this.
Reading Mnemonic
Your soul is sending you a recollection right now of... your past life as a farmer in Oklahoma (おく). You see yourself farming and sweating and living a wonderful life. Hmm, maybe you should move to Oklahoma and live the simple life again.
Imagine recollecting a past life in Oklahoma. Life was simple and nice. You should consider taking this as a sign to move there again!
